title: Campeonato Pernambucano (lower levels)
text:
The Campeonato Pernambucano lower levels are the <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> tournaments for the <a href="Pernambucano">Pernambucano state</a> clubs that don't play in the <a href="Campeonato%20Pernambucano">Campeonato Pernambucano First Division</a>. The competitions are organized by the <a href="Federa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Pernambucana%20de%20Futebol">Pernambucan Football Federation</a>. Usually, the champions of a division are promoted in the next year to the immediately upper level.
Competition format.
The 2021 Série A2 was disputed by 14 clubs. In the first stage, the clubs were divided into two groups. Each group was played on a single round-robin basis. The top four teams of each group advanced to the second stage. In the second stage, the eight qualified clubs were divided into two groups. Each group was played on a single round-robin basis. The top two teams of each group advanced to the third stage. In the third stage, the four qualified clubs played on a single round-robin basis. The top two teams were promoted to 2022 Série A.
